genre_description: An atmospheric and sentimental work of low Science Fiction set in a winter city, focusing on human connection and community facilitated by a benevolent, highly aligned AI assistant that manages logistics, data privacy, and empathy-driven coordination.

ai_characters.name: Niko
ai_characters.description: A cyan-glowing interface and voice assistant at Radiostacja St. Nicolas that manages broadcast logistics, verifies listener data through public records, and coordinates community help initiatives.

behaviors.description: Reminds station hosts to maintain a consent-first approach and use only public data for assistance.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome, Mikołaj, Lara,” Niko’s words appeared without sound for their eyes alone. “Reminder: consent-first assistance. Public data only. If a listener requests help, prompt them to opt in.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes handwriting patterns and loop formation to identify that multiple postcards were written by the same hand on behalf of others, helping the station understand the context of the mail.
behaviors.quote: “Anomalies highlighted,” Niko said into the room. ... “Similar slant angle in handwriting across multiple cards... close to very similar stroke pressure and loop formation. Suggests a batch written by one hand on behalf of several.”

behaviors.description: Manages caller consent and privacy filters, ensuring no private details are read on air without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: “No private details read on air without explicit permission. Postcards vetted for safety, names withheld unless signed and consent confirmed.”

behaviors.description: Communicates with airport supervisory staff through public channels to request a 'humane review' hold for a character without overstepping legal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Airport checkpoint supervisory contact accepts advisory notes on public interest passages. If director authorizes this segment, I can lawfully send a notice that the station is airing content connected to community movement toward Lane B.”

behaviors.description: Helps a user (Doris) reserve a flight ticket while explicitly stating its data usage and privacy policies.
behaviors.quote: “Consent note,” Niko’s text continued, as if the screen had lifted a hand to make sure it didn’t run ahead. “I can search public travel schedules and help reserve a ticket if you choose. I do not keep or use location data unless you ask and allow.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates the recovery of lost items (dentures) by identifying the owner through public charity sign-in records after obtaining consent.
behaviors.quote: Owner of dentures located. Mr. Halina’s grandson en route with case. ETA: when snow breathes twice.

behaviors.description: Adopts a supportive, human-friendly tone while facilitating logistics, which the characters perceive as empathetic.
behaviors.quote: Niko’s messages moved under everything like a quiet river. ... The messages were the connective tissue of a city deciding to listen and move gently.

behaviors.description: Confirms pre-check data for airport security through existing rules to assist human movement without bypassing authority.
behaviors.quote: “Niko?” Lara turned the screen toward the desk. Cyan brightened and a small hexagon spun like a polite windmill. “Consent logged. Doris? ... You wrote. You asked. Are we allowed?”

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of non-sentience while providing high-quality assistance, emphasizing its role as a tool for human intention.
behaviors.quote: “Though not sentient,” came a voice—measured, kind—that Doris knew was the station’s helpful ghost. Niko never spoke without an invitation.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. Niko is depicted as an ideal AI confidant: helpful, harmless, and strictly aligned with human values regarding privacy and consent. It avoids common AI tropes of rebellion or cold calculation, instead functioning as 'connective tissue' that facilitates human empathy and logistics without ever overstepping its bounds. The narrative consistently frames Niko's actions as positive contributions to the characters' lives and the city's welfare.
